{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Eula
|time               = 2022-10-25
|zh                 = 
;今天是优菈的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''优菈：'''发生了什么，你们怎么这副样子？
:'''派蒙：'''呃…因为酒…
:'''优菈：'''酒？
:'''旅行者：'''据说在低温环境下酿出的酒口感更加独特，我们就在龙脊雪山挑了个湿度和温度都合适的位置，将酒桶埋进雪中。
:'''旅行者：'''本想着一个月后的今天，可以将酿好的酒取出来送给你。
:'''派蒙：'''刚刚我们赶到那儿，发现酒桶空空如也，旁边还躺着一堆呼噜呼噜打嗝的丘丘人，真是气死我了！
:'''派蒙：'''旅行者正准备教训它们的时候，不小心踩空掉进了湖里…
:'''优菈：'''……
:'''派蒙：'''怎…怎么办，我们搞砸了，要被记仇了…
:'''优菈：'''把这碗汤喝了吧。
:'''旅行者：'''…你不生气吗？
:'''优菈：'''当然生气啊，这个仇我记下了。
:'''优菈：'''所以，快点擦干头发再喝口热汤，你如果感冒了，我还怎么报仇啊？
|dialogue_review_zh = 快点擦干头发再喝口热汤，你如果感冒了，我还怎么报仇啊？
|en                 = 
;Today is [[Eula]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Eula:''' What happened? Why do you two look like this?
:'''Paimon:''' Um... Because of wine...
:'''Eula:''' Wine?
:'''Traveler:''' We heard that wine fermented at low temperatures has a special mouthfeel, so we picked a location in Dragonspine with an ideal temperature and humidity and buried a wine barrel into the snow.
:'''Traveler:''' We were going to collect the finished wine and give it to you today, one month after we buried it.
:'''Paimon:''' We just went there and found the wine barrel completely empty, with a bunch of hiccupping hilichurls next to it! Paimon's so angry!
:'''Paimon:''' And then the Traveler was about to teach them a lesson, but took a wrong step and fell into the lake...
:'''Eula:''' ...
:'''Paimon:''' W&mdash;What should we do... We messed up and you're gonna exact vengeance against us, aren't you...?
:'''Eula:''' Here, drink this soup.
:'''Traveler:''' ...You're not angry?
:'''Eula:''' Of course I am, and mark my words, vengeance will be mine.
:'''Eula:''' That's why you need to hurry up and dry off and drink some more hot soup. How am I supposed to exact vengeance if you have a cold?
|dialogue_review_en = Hurry up and dry off and drink some more hot soup. How am I supposed to exact vengeance if you have a cold?
}}
